Desc: Welcome to Hearing Tutorial.Please double tap on your selected point of transit.Swipe to continue
Voice: Welcome to Hearing Tutorial. Please double tap on your selected point of transit. Swipe to continue.

Desc: Choose the type of information you need to ask driver by Double Tapping
Voice: Choose the type of information you need to ask driver by Double Tapping.

Desc: Double Tap on Back Button to go to previous screen.
Voice: Double Tap on Back Button to go to previous screen.

Desc: Double Tap on Home Button to go to Home screen.
Voice: Double Tap on Home Button to go to Home screen

Desc: Double Tap on Yes or No Button to respond.
Voice: Double Tap on Yes or No Button to respond.

Desc: Double Tap on More Button to go to Response screen.
Voice: Double Tap on More Button to go to Response screen.

Desc: In the Response screen Double Tap on 'Input your Text' to open Text to Voice Box.
Voice: In the Response screen Double Tap on 'Input your Text' to open Text to Voice Box.

Desc: Use the on screen keyboard to type in your text.
Voice: Use the on screen keyboard to type in your text.

Desc: Press 'Done' on the On screen keyboard when you are finished typing.
Voice: Press 'Done' on the On screen keyboard when you are finished typing.

Desc: Use 'Speak' Button to speak your text. Use 'Save' Button to save your text. Use 'Cancel' Button to cancel the box when your are done
Voice: Use 'Speak' Button to speak your text. Use 'Save' Button to save your text. Use 'Cancel' Button to cancel the box when your are done

Desc: Scroll up and down and make your selection by Double Tapping.
Voice: Scroll up and down and make your selection by Double Tapping.

Desc: Bienvenido al Tutorial Auditivo. Por favor presione dos veces en su punto de transporte seleccionado.Deslizar para continuar
Voice: Welcome to Hearing Tutorial. Please Double Tap on your selected point of transit. Swipe to continue.

Desc: Desplace la pantalla hacia abajo y seleccione sus preguntas presionando dos veces.
Voice: Scroll up and down and make your selection by Double Tapping.

Desc: Presione dos veces en el botón de la flecha apuntando hacia la izquierda para regresar a la pantalla anterior.
Voice: Double Tap on Back Button to go to previous screen.

Desc: Presione dos veces en el botón de la casa para ir a la pantalla principal.
Voice: Double Tap on Home Button to go to Home screen.

Desc: Presione dos veces en el botón de “Sí” o “No” para responder.
Voice: Double Tap on Yes or No Button to respond

Desc: Presione dos veces en el botón de “Más” para ir a la pantalla de respuestas.
Voice: Double Tap on More Button to go to Response screen.

Desc: Desplace la pantalla y presione dos veces cualquier botón para responder.
Voice: Scroll up and down and make your selection by Double Tapping.
